Class ClientInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    class ClientInstance
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class that implements Runnable and connects the Client to the Server before handling the sending of messages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  ClientInstance.ServerListener
      Class that extends the Thread class and uses a BufferedReader to listen for messages from the Server.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.io.BufferedReader clientInputReader
      BufferedReader to read input from standard input.
      private java.io.InputStreamReader clientStreamReader
      InputStreamReader to read input from user.
      private java.io.PrintWriter clientWriter
      PrintWriter to print output from the Server.
      private java.net.InetAddress ipAddr
      InetAddress field to store the IP address of the Server.
      private int portNum
      Int field to store the port number of the Server.
      private boolean stop
      Boolean field that is set to true when Server or Client disconnects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientInstance(java.lang.String ipAddr, java.lang.String portNum)
      Constructor to call within ClientMain class and allows for thread to be started upon object of this class.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientInstance

        public ClientInstance(java.lang.String ipAddr,
                      java.lang.String portNum)
        Constructor to call within ClientMain class and allows for thread to be started upon object of this class.
        Parameters:
        ipAddr - - a String containing the IP address of the Server.
        portNum - - a String containing the port number of the Server

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Method override that connects to Server via a Socket. Method then starts a ServerListener thread and calls the sendMessage method.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • sendMessage

        private void sendMessage()
        Method to send message to the server. Method reads from Standard Input and writes to the Socket where the Client is connected to the Server. Methd then flushes the buffers of clientWriter to ensure message is sent to the Server.
